Package eapli.framework.domain.ddd

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AggregateRoot<I>
    An aggregate root is a Domain-Driven Design pattern for defining scopes of change and "whole-objects". some entities cluster other objects (entities and value objects) which don't make sense to exist outside of that entity (e.g., OrderLine and Order).
    DeleteableRepository<T extends AggregateRoot<?>,I extends Serializable>  
    DomainEntity<I>
    An entity is a Domain-Driven Design pattern for concepts in the domain which have a thread of continuity which needs to be tracked.
    DomainEvent
    A Domain event is a domain/driven design pattern to signal significant events that happened in the domain.
    DomainFactory<T extends DomainEntity<?>>
    A factory of domain objects.
    Repository<T extends AggregateRoot<?>,I extends Serializable>
    A repository is a domain-driven design pattern to abstract the details of persisting domain objects. it exposes a pure domain based interface without leaking details of the implementation of the actual persistence mechanism.
    ValueObject
    A value object is a Domain-Driven Design pattern for domain concepts which do not have a thread of continuity neither need to be tracked by their identity but for the value of its attributes.
    ValueObjectFactory<T extends ValueObject>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DomainEntityHelper  
    DomainEventBase
